spec_data.Name: perl-Business-Hours
spec_data.Description:
A simple tool for calculating business hours in a time period. Over time,
additional functionality will be added to make it easy to calculate the
number of business hours between arbitrary dates.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:45:15 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Calculate business hours in a time period
